metadata.title: CVE-2022-31676 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
VMware Tools (12.0.0, 11.x.y and 10.x.y) contains a local privilegeescalation vulnerability. A malicious actor with local non-administrativeaccess to the Guest OS can escalate privileges as a root user in thevirtual machine.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31676` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

open-vm-tools - 2:10.2.0-3~ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
open-vm-tools-desktop - 2:10.2.0-3~ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:10.2.0-3~ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
